title: Glitterbomb: The Lion Queen @ Kuda
description:
Glitterbomb: The Lion Queen @ Kuda Cambridge

10pm – 3am

Join amazing Queens and Bombshells, as you become a part of the circle of life that is Glitterbomb!
So brush those manes, and practice your roars for a Hakuna Matata evening full of singing!

Glitterbomb aims to give you a safe place to express yourself, have fun and forgot about the everyday as you dance the night away to the best pop music, enjoy cheap drinks, dress yourself in glow sticks and become part of a community of people just like you!
